description: This file defines a 'Loader' component using Lightning.js framework, which displays animated circles to indicate loading status.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A UI component displaying animated circles as a loading indicator.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's reactive state including colors and alpha transparency levels.

methods.name: hooks.ready
methods.description: Sets up an interval timer to cyclically update the alpha transparency of circles for animation.
